hero.title: Where Real Creators Become Iconic
hero.subtitle: A luxury creative agency in heart of Amsterdam iconic district, guiding creators in the art of presence, identity, and digital performance.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.para1: Bureau Boudoir is an exclusive creator management agency based in Amsterdam's iconic Red Light District. We blend artistic vision with business intelligence to build sustainable creator careers.
whoWeAre.para2: From professional photoshoots to AI-powered marketing, we handle everything so you can focus on being creative.

production.title: Professional Production
production.description: Studio shoots, editing, and content curation

support.title: 24/7 Support Team
support.description: Dedicated account manager and creative director

whatWeDo.label: What We Do
whatWeDo.title: We Help Creators Build Profitable Personal Brands Through Professional Content & Smart Marketing

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the premier creator agency in Europe, setting the standard for luxury adult content creation. We envision a world where creators are empowered with world-class tools, support, and opportunities to build sustainable, fulfilling careers on their own terms.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform creators into successful entrepreneurs by providing end-to-end support: from professional content production in our Amsterdam studio to AI-driven marketing and personalized account management. We handle the business so you can focus on creativity.

services.title: Our Creator Services
services.intro: End-to-end creator management. From strategy to execution.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Persona development, boundaries, brand strategy, and market positioning.

production.title: Production
production.description: Studio shoots, lighting, styling, posing, and high-end visual content.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Content strategy, storytelling, social hooks, and audience building.

supportCard.title: Support
supportCard.description: team access, analytics, guidance, and ongoing optimization.

brand.title: The Brand Umbrella
brand.description: A cinematic Amsterdam-inspired identity shaped uniquely around you. We don't use templates — we craft brands that feel like stories.

content.title: Professional Content
content.description: Studio lighting, posing, styling, and high-end content direction. Not phone selfies — real production quality.

marketingMachine.title: Marketing Machine
marketingMachine.description: Not random posting — real funnels, scripts, high-ticket strategy, and retention systems. Growth backed by structure.

hero.title: About Bureau Boudoir
hero.subtitle: Elevating Amsterdam creators through professional content management and strategic marketing

story.title: Our Story
story.para1: Born in the heart of Amsterdam's iconic Red Light District, Bureau Boudoir emerged from a simple vision: to transform the way creators approach their content business.
story.para2: We recognized that talented creators were spending countless hours on production, marketing, and business operations—time that could be better spent on what they do best: creating.
story.para3: Today, Bureau Boudoir stands as Amsterdam's premier content management agency, bringing together creative excellence, professional production standards, and strategic marketing expertise.

planning.title: Content Planning
planning.description: Strategic content calendars, shoot planning, and creative direction tailored to your unique style and audience.

production.title: Professional Production
production.description: Studio-quality photo and video production with experienced teams who understand luxury content creation.

marketing.title: Strategic Marketing
marketing.description: Data-driven marketing strategies, platform optimization, and growth tactics that maximize your reach and revenue.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: We bring industry-leading standards to every aspect of content creation and management.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: Your unique voice and vision are at the center of everything we do.

support.title: Support
support.description: 24/7 access to our team ensures you always have the guidance and resources you need.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We give creators the tools, knowledge, and confidence to build sustainable, successful businesses.
